Name: Jamie Wolf
Details: Jamie Wolf is the commander of Wolf's Dragoons and its Alpha regiment, one of the galaxy's elite mercenary units. Jamie has been their commander since their arrival at the Inner Sphere from an unknown location, which has caused all sort of rumors about Colonel Wolf's past. The mercenary colonel had a brother, Joshua, who was killed by Anton Marik during the Marik Civil War and was the rumored lover of Natasha Kerensky.
